tuv.seg: AN ACT TO GRANT AND APPROPRIATE CERTAIN SUMS FOR THE SERVICE OF THE FINANCIAL YEAR ENDING ON THE 31st DAY OF MARCH, 1923
ACHT CHUN SUIMEANNA áIRITHE DO DHEONú AGUS DO CHUR I LEITHREAS CHUN SEIRBHíSE NA BLIANA AIRGID A CHRíOCHNóIDH AR AN 31adh Lá DE MHáRTA, 1923
BE IT ENACTED BY THE OIREACHTAS OF SAORSTÁT EIREANN AS FOLLOWS:—
ACHTUIGHEADH OIREACHTAS SHAORSTáIT ÉIREANN MAR LEANAS:— 1

1.—The Minister of Finance may issue out of the Central Fund and apply towards making good the supply granted for the service of the year ending on the thirty-first day of March, one thousand nine hundred and twenty-three, such sum as together with sums already issued for Supply Services out of the Consolidated Fund of the Provisional Government shall amount to the aggregate sum of thirty-eight million fifty-one thousand and eighty-six pounds

Féadfaidh an t-Aire um Airgead an tsuim sin a dhéanfaidh, i dteanta na suimeanna a tugadh cheana féin chun Seirbhísí Soláthair as Ciste Có-dhlúite an Rialtais Shealadaigh, an lántsuim d'ocht milleoin déag ar fhichid, aon mhíle dhéag is dachad agus sé púint is cheithre fichid, do thabhairt as an bPrímh-Chiste agus é do chur chun líona an tsoláthair do deonadh chun seirbhíse na bliana a chríochnóidh ar an t-aonú lá déag ar fhichid de Mhárta, míle naoi gcéad a trí is fiche

2.—(i.) The Minister of Finance may borrow from any person or banking corporation in Saorstát Eireann and the Bank of Ireland may advance to the Minister of Finance on the credit of the sum authorised to be issued by Section One of this Act any sum or sums not exceeding the amount so authorised, and for the purpose of such borrowing the Minister of Finance may create and issue any securities bearing such rate of interest and subject to such conditions as to repayment, redemption or otherwise as he thinks fit

2. —(i.) Féadfaidh an t-Aire um Airgead aon tsuim no suimeanna ná raghaidh thar an méid a údaruíonn Alt a hAon den Acht so do thabhairt amach, d'fháil ar iasacht ó aon duine no ó aon bhanc-bhárdas i Saorstát Éireann agus féadfaidh Banc na hÉireann í no iad do thabhairt ar iasacht don Aire um Airgead, ar chreidiúint na suime a údarófar mar sin; agus chun críche na hiasachta san féadfaidh an t-Aire um Airgead pé urúsanna ar a mbeidh an ráta úis sin agus a bheidh de réir na gcoiníollacha san i dtaobh aisig, fuascailte no aon ní eile is oiriúnach leis, do bhunú agus do thabhairt amach

(ii.) The principal and interest of any securities issued under this Act and the expenses incurred in connection with the issue of such securities shall be charged on the Central Fund or the growing produce thereof
(ii.) Eileofar ar an bPrímh-Chiste no ar a thora fáis bunairgead agus ús pé urúis a tabharfar amach fén Acht so agus na costaisí a thárlóidh i dtaobh tabhartha amach na n-urús san

(iii.) Any money raised by securities issued under this Act shall be placed to the credit of the account of the Exchequer and shall form part of the Central Fund and be available in any manner in which such Fund is available

(iii.) Aon airgead a gheobhfar de bharr urúsanna a tabharfar amach fén Acht so cuirfear é i leith chúntais an Stát-Chiste agus beidh sé mar chuid den Phrímh-Chiste agus beidh sé ar fáil in aon tslí 'na mbeidh an Ciste sin ar fáil

All sums granted by this Act, together with sums already issued for Supply Services out of the Consolidated Fund of the Provisional Government, amounting in the aggregate to thirty-eight million fifty-one thousand and eighty-six pounds as set out in column (3) of the Schedule to this Act, are appropriated and shall be deemed to have been appropriated for the services and purposes expressed in column (2) of the said Schedule

Na suimeanna uile a dheonuíonn an t-Acht so i dteanta na suimeanna do tugadh amach cheana i gcóir Seirbhísí Soláthair as Ciste Có-dhlúite an Rialtais Shealadaigh gurb é a n-iomlán ocht milleoin déag ar fhichid, aon mhíle dhéag is dachad agus sé púint is cheithre fichid do réir mar teasbántar i gcolún (3) den Sceideal a ghabhann leis an Acht so, cuirfear agus tuigfear iad do chur i leithreas chun na seirbhísí agus na gcríoch atá luaidhte i gcolún (2) den Sceideal roimh-ráite
The said Schedule shall be deemed to be part of this Act in the same manner as if it had been contained in the body thereof
Tuigfear an Sceideal roimh-ráite do bheith 'na chuid den Acht so i leith is go raibh sé i gcorp an Achta

In addition to the sums hereby granted out of the Central Fund there may be applied out of any money directed under Section two of the Public Accounts and Charges Act, 1891, to be applied as appropriations in aid of the grants for the services and purposes specified in column (2) of the said Schedule the sums respectively set forth in column (4) of the said Schedule

I dteanta na suimeanna a deontar leis seo as an bPrímh-Chiste, féadfar na suimeanna a teasbántar fé seach i gcolún (4) den Sceideal roimh-ráite do thabhairt as aon airgead go n-orduítear, fé alt a dó den Acht ar Chúntaisí Puiblí agus Muirir, 1891, a thabhairt mar leithreasaí i gcabhair na ndeontas do sna seirbhísí is na críocha atá luaidhte i gcolún (2) den Sceideal roimh-ráite

A person shall not receive any part of a grant which may be made in pursuance of this Act for non-effective services until he has subscribed such declaration as may from time to time be prescribed by a warrant of the Minister of Finance before one of the persons prescribed by such warrant

Ní bhfaghaidh neach aon chuid de dheontas a déanfar ar son seirbhísí neamh-fheidhmiúla do réir an Achta so go dtí go gcuirfe sé a ainm le pé faisnéis a leagfar amach ó am go ham le barántas ón Aire um Airgead i bhfianaise duine de sna daoine a luadhfar sa bharántas san

Provided that whenever any such payment is made at more frequent intervals than once in a quarter the Minister of Finance may dispense with the production of more than one declaration in respect of each quarter
Ar choiníoll nuair a déanfar aon díoluíocht dá sórt níos minicí ná uair sa ráithe go bhféadfaidh an t-Aire um Airgead a cheadú nách gá níos mó ná faisnéis amháin do theasbáint i gcóir gach ráithe
Any person who makes a declaration for the purpose of this section, knowing the same to be untrue in any material particular, shall be guilty of a misdemeanour
Aon duine a dhéanfaidh faisnéis chun críche an ailt seo, agus a fhios aige neamh-fhírinne do bheith in aon phonc táchtach di, beidh sé ciontach i mí-iompar
This Act may be cited for all purposes as the Appropriation Act, 1922
Féadfar an t-Acht Leithreasa, 1922 , do ghairm don Acht so chun gach críche

SCHEDULE of Sums Granted and of Sums which may be applied as Appropriations in Aid in addition thereto to defray the charges of the several Public Services herein particularly mentioned, which will come in course of payment during the year ending 31st day of March, 1923, viz.:—

Sceideal de Shuimeanna do Deonadh agus de sna Suimeanna a féadfar a chur mar Leithreasaí i gCabhair 'na dteanta san chun díoluíocht mhuirearacha na Seirbhísí Puiblí ar leithrigh a luaidhtear anso go speisialta agus a thiocfaidh chun díoluíochta i rith na bliana a chríochnóidh ar an 31adh lá de Mhárta, 1923, eadhon:—
For the salaries and expenses of the Ministry of Finance, including certain subordinate departments
Chun tuarastail agus costaisí na hAireachta um Airgead mar aon le fo-ranna áirithe
For grants to Universities and Colleges, including grants under the Irish Universities Act, 1908
Chun deontaisí do Phríomh-Scoileanna agus do Choláistí mar aon le deontaisí fén Acht ar Phríomh-Scoileanna Eireannacha, 1908
For Old Age Pensions, for certain administrative expenses in connection therewith, and for pensions under the Blind Persons Act, 1920
Chun Pinseanna Sean-Aoise, chun costaisí riartha áirithe 'na dtaobh, agus chun pinseanna fé Acht na nDall, 1920
For charges connected with hospitals and infirmaries, and certain miscellaneous charitable and other allowances, including sundry grants in aid
Chun muirir i dtaobh óispidéal agus otharlann, agus liúntaisí áirithe il-ghnéitheacha déirciúla agus eile mar aon le hil-deontaisí i gcabhair
For the expenses of reformatory and industrial schools, including places of detention
Chun costaisí scoileanna ceartúcháin agus saothair, mar aon le háiteanna cimeádtha
For the expenses of criminal prosecutions and other law charges, including a grant in relief of certain expenses payable by statute out of local rates
Chun costaisí coir-phróiseacht agus dlímhuirearacha eile mar aon le deontas i gcabhair do chostaisí áirithe indíolta as áitiúla do réir reachta

For the salaries and allowances and expenses of various county court officers and of magistrates, bonus to chairmen of quarter sessions and recorders and to clerks of the Crown and Peace, and expenses of revision

Chun tuarastail agus liúntaisí agus costaisí oifigeach iomdha cúirte contae agus giúistísí, chun bonus do chathaoirligh Cheathrú Shiosóin agus do bhreacthóirí agus do chléirigh na Coróinneach agus na Siochána, agus chun costaisí ath-fhéachainte
For certain miscellaneous expenses, including certain grants in aid
Chun costaisí il-ghnéitheacha áirithe, mar aon le deontaisí áirithe i gcabhair

For the salaries and expenses of the Insurance Commission, and for sundry contributions and grants in respect of the cost of benefits and expenses of administration under the National Health Insurance Acts, 1911 to 1921 (including certain grants in aid)

Chun tuarastail agus costaisí an Choimisiúin Árachais agus chun il-shíntiúisí agus ildeontaisí mar gheall ar chostas tairbhí agus costaisí riarachta fé sna hAchtanna ar Árachas Sláinte Náisiúnta, 1911 go 1921 (mar aon le deontaisí áirithe i gcabhair)
For the salaries and expenses of the office of the Commissioners of Charitable Donations and Bequests
Chun tuarastail agus costaisí oifige Coimisinéirí na dTabharthas agus na dTiomna Déirciúla
For the salaries and expenses of the General Valuation and Boundary Survey, including Estate Duty Valuation under the Finance (1909-10) Act, 1910
Chun tuarastail agus costaisí na Suirbhéireachta Teorann agus an Mheasa Ghenerálta mar aon le Meas Diúité Eastáit fén Acht (1909-10) Airgid, 1910
For the salaries and expenses of the Office of Public Works
Chun tuarastail agus costaisí Oifige na n-Oibreacha Puiblí
For expenditure in respect of Public Buildings; for the maintenance of certain parks and public works, for maintenance of drainage works on the river Shannon and sundry grants in aid
Chun caiteachais i dtaobh Tighthe Puiblí; chun coinneáil pháirceanna agus oibreacha puiblí áirithe; chun coinneáil oibreacha draeneála ar abhainn na Sionainne agus chun il-deontaisí i gcabhair
For payments under the Tramways and Public Companies (Ireland) Act, 1883, etc., and for other purposes connected with Irish Railways
Chun díoluíocht fén Acht um Bhóithre Tram agus Cuideachtana Puiblí (Éirinn), 1883, etc., agus chun críoch eile a bhaineann le Bóithre Iarainn na hÉireann
For the salaries and expenses of the Commissioner of Police, the police courts and the metropolitan police establishment of Dublin
Chun tuarastail agus costaisí Coimisinéir na bPóilíní, cúirteanna na bpóilíní agus teaghlachas póilíní cathrach Bhaile Atha Cliath

For the expenses of the General Prisons Board and of the establishments under their control, the registration of habitual criminals, and the maintenance of criminal lunatics confined in district lunatic asylums
Chun costaisí Bhórd Generálta na bPríosún agus na dteaghlachas fé n-a smacht, chun cláru na síor-chuirptheach agus chun cimeád suas na ngealt cuirpe a choinnítear i ngealtlanna ceantair
For the salaries and expenses of the Public Record Office and of the Keeper of State Papers
Chun tuarastail agus costaisí Oifig na n-Análacha Puiblí agus Coimeádaí na Stát-Pháipéar
For the salaries and expenses of the Supreme Court of Judicature and of the High Court of Appeal
Chun tuarastal agus costaisí Cúirte Uachtaraighe an Údaráis agus Árd-Chúirte na hAth-éisteachta
For the expenses of the Department of National Education, including grants in aid of the Teachers' Pension Fund
Chun costaisí na Roinne um Oideachas Náisiúnta, mar aon le deontaisí i gcabhair do Chiste Phinsin na Múinteoirí
For intermediate education, including the Teachers' Salaries Grant
Chun oideachais idirmheadhonaigh, mar aon le Deontas Tuarastail na Múinteoirí
For the salary of the secretary, including bonus and the expenses of the office of the Commissioners for managing certain school endowments
Chun tuarastal an rúnaí mar aon le bonus agus costaisí oifig na gCoimisinéirí chun brontanaisí áirithe scoile do bhainistí
For the salaries and expenses of the Ministry of Agriculture, and of certain services administered by that Ministry, including sundry grants in aid
Chun tuarastail agus costaisí na hAireachta um Thalmhuíocht agus seirbhísí áirithe atá fé riara na hAireachta san, mar aon le hil-deontaisí i gcabhair

For the salaries and expenses of the Institutions of Science and Art, Dublin, and of the Geological Survey of Ireland, and annual grants to schools and classes of Science and Art and Technical Instruction, including sundry grants in aid, administered by the Department of Agriculture and Technical Instruction

Chun tuarastail agus costaisí na bhFúndúireachtaí Eoluíochta agus Ealadhan i mBaile Atha Cliath agus Suirbhéireachta Géolaighe na hÉireann agus chun deontaisí bliantúla do scoileanna agus bhuidheanta Eoluíochta agus Ealadhan agus Teagaisc Theicnicigh, mar aon le hil-deontaisí i gcabhair, atá fé riara na Roinne um Thalmhuíocht agus Theagasc Teicniceach
For the salaries and expenses of the National Gallery
Chun tuarastail agus costaisí an Ghailléire Náisiúnta
For Grants administered by the Congested Districts Board, including grants in aid
Chun deontaisí a riarann Bórd na gCeantar gCumhang mar aon le deontaisí i gcabhair
For the salaries and expenses of the Ministry of Local Government, including grants and other expenses in connection with housing, grants to local authorities and sundry grants in aid
Chun tuarastail agus costaisí na hAireachta um Rialtas Áitiúil, mar aon le deontaisí agus costaisí eile a bhaineann le tógáil tighthe, chun deontaisí d'údaráis áitiúla agus il-deontaisí i gcabhair
For the salaries and expenses of the department of the Registrar-General of Births, etc, including bonus to the Registrar-General, and the expenses of collecting emigration statistics
Chun tuarastail agus costaisí Roinne Ard-Chláradóra na mBreith, etc., mar aon le bonus don Ard-Chláradóir, agus costaisí figiúirí na himirce do bhailiú
For the maintenance of criminal lunatics in the Dundrum Asylum
Chun geilteana cuirpe i nGealtlann Dúndroma do chothú
For the salaries and expenses of the Transport Department of the Ministry of Industry and Commerce, including certain payments in connection with Railways
Chun tuarastail agus costaisí Roinn an Iompair den Aireacht um Thiúscal agus Thráchtáil mar aon le díoluíochta áirithe ag baint le Bóithre Iarainn
For the Ireland Development Grant (grant in aid)
Chun Deontas Fás-saothrú na hÉireann (deontas i gcabhair)

For the expense of providing stationery, printing, paper, binding, and printed books for the public service, for the salaries and expenses of the Stationery Office, and for sundry miscellaneous services, including reports of Oireachtas debates

Chun costas páipéarachas, cló-bhuala, páipéar, greamuíocht agus leabhra clóbhuailte do sholáthar don tseirbhís phuiblí, chun tuarastail agus costaisí Oifig an tSoláthair, agus chun il-sheirbhísí ilghnéitheacha mar aon le tuairiscí díospóireachtaí an Oireachtais

For the salaries and expenses of the Ministry of Industry and Commerce, including Umpire and Courts of Referees, contributions to the Unemployment Insurance Fund and to Special Schemes, and to the Unemployed Workers' Dependents' Fund, and payment to Associations under the Unemployment Insurance Acts

Chun tuarastail agus costaisí na hAireachta um Thiúscal agus Thráchtáil mar aon le Moltóir agus Cúirteanna Réiteoirí, chun síntiúisí don Chiste um Árachas Díomhaointis agus do Scéimeanna Speisialta agus don Chiste um Muirir Oibríthe díomhaoine agus chun díoluíochta le Cumannacha fé sna hAchtanna um Árachas Díomhaointis
To provide capital for the Local Loans Fund, and to make repayment to the British Government in respect of local loans outstanding on 1st April, 1922
Chun bun-airgead do sholáthar do Chiste na nIasachtai Áitiúla, agus chun aiseag do dhéanamh le Rialtas na Breataine mar gheall ar iasachtaí áitiúla a bhí gan díol ar an ladh Abrán, 1922
For the salaries and expenses of the Department of the Comptroller and Auditor-General
Chun tuarastail agus costaisí Roinne an Árd-Sgrúdóra
For the salaries and other expenses of Temporary Commissions, Committees, and Special Inquiries
Chun tuarastail agus costaisí eile Coimisiún Sealadach, Coistí agus Fiosrúchán Speisialta
For expenses under the Representation of the People Act, 1918
Chun costaisí fé Acht Ionaduíochta na nDaoine, 1918

For payments by way of loans for purposes of reconstruction in anticipation of the determination by the Compensation (Ireland) Commission of fair and reasonable compensation in cases where the Government are satisfied that such a course is specially desirable in the interests of industry, trade or employment

Chun díoluíochta i bhfuirm iasachtaí chun ath-thógála ag súil leis an socrú ar chúiteamh cóir réasúnta a dhéanfaidh an Coimisiún Cúitimh (Éirinn) i gcásanna 'na bhfuil an Rialtas sásta gur mór a raghadh san chun leasa tiúscail tráchtála no feadhmanais
For the salaries and expenses of the secretariat and special services
Chun tuarastail agus costaisí na rúnaíochta agus seirbhísí speisialta
For the cost of the Army
Chun costas an Airm
For loans for the purpose of reconstructing destroyed buildings in Cork City
Chun iasachtaí chun na dtighthe do loiteadh i gCathair Chorcaighe d'ath-thógáil
For the salaries and expenses of the Civic Guard
Chun tuarastail agus costaisí an Ghárda Shíochána

For superannuation, compensation, compassionate and additional allowances and gratuities under sundry Statutes, compensation under Article 10 of the Treaty of the 6th December, 1921, compassionate allowances, gratuities and supplementary pensions awarded by the Ministry of Finance, the salary of the Medical Referee; and sundry repayments in respect of pensions at present paid by the British Government

Chun pinsean, cúitimh, liúntaisí maoithe agus breise agus tabharthaistí fé Reachtanna ioldha; chun cúitimh fé Airtiogal 10 den Chonnradh den 6adh Mí na Nodlag, 1921; chun liúntaisí maoithe, tabharthaistí agus pinseanna breise deonuithe ag an Aireacht um Airgead; chun tuarastal an Dochtúra Réitigh; agus chun il-aiseag i dtaobh pinseann a dhíolann Rialtas na Breataine fé láthaír
For the salaries and expenses of the Ministry of Home Affairs
Chun tuarastail agus costaisí na hAireachta um Ghnóthaí Dúithche
For special grants towards the relief of unemployment and distress
Chun deontaisí speisialta le haghaidh fóirithin i ndíomhaointeas agus gátar
For payments in respect of destruction of, or injuries to, property on or after the 21st January, 1919
Chun díoluíochta i dtaobh lot no damáiste maoine do dineadh ar no tar éis an 21adh Eanair, 1919
For rates and contributions in lieu of rates, etc., in respect of Government propery
Chun rátaí agus sintiúisí in ionad rátaí, etc., i dtaobh maoine Rialtais
For recoupment of local authorities of amounts due to them in respect of Local Taxation Grants formerly withheld by the British Government
Chun cúiteamh le húdaráis áitiúla ar shuimeanna atá ag dul dóibh i dtaobh Deontaisí Cánach Áitiúla a chimeád Rialtas na Breataine siar uatha
For the salaries and expenses of the Customs and Excise service
Chun tuarastail agus costaisí seirbhís na gCustum agus an Mháil
For the salaries and expenses of the Inland Revenue Service
Chun tuarastail agus costaisí Seirbhís an Ioncaim Dhúchais
For the salaries and expenses of the Criminal Investigation Department
Chun tuarastail agus costaisí na Roinne Taighde um Chuirpthigh
For a grant in aid in respect of the improvement of Croke Park in connection with the Tailteann Games
Chun deontas i gcabhair i dtaobh feabhasu Pháirc an Chrócaigh i gcóir Aonach Tailteann
For the salaries and expenses of the Marine Service
Chun tuarastail agus costaisí na Muirsheirbhíse
For the salaries and expenses of Dáil Eireann
Chun tuarastail agus costaisí Dáil Éireann
For the salaries and expenses of the Land Commission
Chun tuarastail agus costaisí Coimisiún an Talaimh
For the salaries and expenses of the Post Office, including Telegraphs and Telephones
Chun tuarastail agus costaisí na Post-oifige, mar aon le Telegráfa agus Telefóna
For a grant in aid of the Forestry Fund
Chun Deontas i gcabhair don Chiste Foraoise
For the salaries and expenses of the Ordnance Survey, and of minor services connected therewith
Chun tuarastail agus costaisí Suirbhéireachta an Ordonáis, agus chun mionsheirbhísí a bhaineann léi
For the salaries and expenses of additional and unforeseen services
Chun tuarastail agus costaisí seirbhísí breise agus seirbhísí ná raibh súil leo
For the salaries and expenses of District Justices
Chun tuarastail agus costaisí Giúistísí Dúithche
For compensation in respect of personal injuries or death
Chun cúitimh i dtaobh leonta pearsanta no báis
For the salaries and expenses of the Governor General's establishment
Chun tuarastail agus costaisí teaghlachais an tSeanascail
For grant in aid of the Development Fund
Chun deontas i gcabhair don Chiste Fássaothrúcháin
For the salaries and expenses of the Ministry of External Affairs
Chun tuarastail agus costaisí na hAireachta um Ghnóthaí Coigcríche
